function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete coverage of drug information in existing ontologies","Impact":"Missing information could lead to ineffective drug studies or misinformation in drug research","Mitigation":"Develop a process for regularly updating and expanding drug information in ontologies","Technologies":"Ontology management tools for continuous updating and expansion","People":"Researchers, drug developers, and healthcare professionals","Owner":"Ontology development team, drug research organizations"},{"Description":"Insufficient representation of vaccine information in ontologies","Impact":"Lack of comprehensive vaccine information could hinder vaccine research and development","Mitigation":"Collaborate with vaccine ontology development team to improve representation and annotation of vaccine candidates","Technologies":"Vaccine ontology tools for modeling and analysis","People":"Vaccine researchers, immunologists, and public health officials","Owner":"Vaccine ontology development team, research organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of misinformation due to incomplete ontology-based approaches","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of host-coronavirus interactions and immune system mechanisms, potentially leading to ineffective precision medicine research and vaccine design","Mitigation":"Implement quality assurance measures for ontology-based data mining and analysis","Technologies":"Ontology verification tools, data validation algorithms","People":"Researchers, immunologists, and public health officials","Owner":"Research organizations, ontology development teams"}]}
